roleset.name: not possible to carry out, put into practice
roleset.note: INFEASIBLE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to feasible-j.01. (from infeasible.01-j)

role.descr: thing that is not possible, feasible

example.name: With It EXP
example.text: Arguably Libya is a different matter entirely and it would be unconscionable to watch Gaddafi slaughter his own people , but it *EXP* would be inappropriate and infeasible for Britain to go it alone
example.arg: for Britain to go it alone

example.name: Both args
example.text: I need my meat though; it *EXP* is infeasible for me to abandon meat for more than 2 days.
example.arg: to abandon meat for more than 2 days.
